p: In the current study, the species included that are often incorrectly identified as P. rotundifolia are: the two forgotten species P. cotinifolia A.Cunn. ex Benth. (COA-1) and P. latifolia (LAIA-1a, -1b), and the new species, P. sp. Blue Mountains (BEM-1), P. sp. Ulan (ULN-1, ‘The Drip’), and P. sp. Barren Mountain (BNM-1, -2 and -3). In the current study, three specimens of actual P. rotundifolia were also sampled, one from Tasmania (ROA-1) and two from Victoria (ROA-2a and -2b).
